alphabetsoup.base
Class WordStationBase

java.lang.Object
  alphabetsoup.framework.Circle
      alphabetsoup.base.WordStationBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Updateable, WordStation
Direct Known Subclasses:
WordStationAgent, WordStationAgent
public class WordStationBase
extends Circle
implements WordStation, Updateable

WordStationBase implements the basic functionality of a passive Word station, such that it can take letters from buckets when requested, clears words when complete, and can be assigned new words when space permits.

Author:
Chris Hazard

requestLetterTake

public void requestLetterTake(Bucketbot bb,
                              Letter l,
                              Word w)
Description copied from interface: WordStation
Requests that the WordStation transfer the Letters from the Bucket to the WordStation and placed into Words.

Specified by:
requestLetterTake in interface WordStation
Parameters:
bb - Bucketbot carying the bucket from which the letters should be taken from (if within range)
l - Reference to the Letter that should be taken from the Bucket
w - Word that the Letter should be placed into. If null, then it will chose the first Word that requires the letter.
